data.eml:eml: Two new species of Allonychiurus Yoshii, 1995 (Collembola, Onychiuridae) from eastern China, with a key to world species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chang, Liang, Sun, Xin (2016): Two new species of Allonychiurus Yoshii, 1995 (Collembola, Onychiuridae) from eastern China, with a key to world species of the genus. Zootaxa 4061 (4): 429-437, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.4.7
